items.sentence: Tom sat in the waiting room reading a magazine.
Tom sat on the floor between the door and Mary.
Tom saved himself by jumping out of the window.
Tom spent the last years of his life in Boston.
I think all three of us will be there tomorrow.
I think that you should buy yourself a new car.
Tom hardly ever relies on other people\'s help.
Tom has a doctor\'s appointment this afternoon.
Tom said that he didn\'t know where Mary lived.
A permanent job is better than a temporary one.
